author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Namakkal Kavignar Ramalingam Government Arts College for Women has secured ‘A’ grade in the recent accreditation done by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

The college has been accredited with a Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA) of 3.18 on a four point scale to secure the coveted ‘A’ Grade.

A peer team of the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) visited the college recently for institutional grading.
title: NAAC’s ‘A’ grade to women’s college
